item.title: By: Trevor Turk
item.dc:creator: Trevor Turk
item.description: Cool! Personally, I like to use the whenever gem, which provides a nice DSL for defining cron jobs. This can also be combined with delayed_job or resque, so you might have a cron job that creates a bunch of background tasks. I've used this technique for sending out weekly emails, etc.
